title: Strange Illusion (1945 Film Noir) A Haunting Mystery Thriller! Directed by Edgar G. Ulmer

sources.title: Strange Illusion (1945 Film Noir) A Haunting Mystery Thriller! Directed by Edgar G. Ulmer
sources.description:
Clean-cut American teen Paul Cartwright (James Lydon) has recurring dreams of his mother, Virginia (Sally Eilers), falling for a dangerous man. As the dreams grow more vivid, Paul enlists the help of his psychiatrist, Dr. Vincent (Regis Toomey), and discovers that his mother's' suitor; Brett Curtis (Warren William) is a violent psychopath living under the care of the shady Professor Muhlbach (Charles Arnt) at a sanitarium. When Curtis tries to marry his mother, Paul races to stop him and uncovers the terrifying truth behind his visions.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/is9izUA6was


Director: Edgar G. Ulmer
Writers: Adele Comandini, Fritz Rotter
Stars: Jimmy Lydon, Sally Eilers, Warren William
Genres: Film Noir, Drama, Crime, Thriller, Mystery & Suspense


 @CultCinemaClassics
